component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
update false java.lang.String
Client side id of the component(s) to be updated after file upload completes.
fileUploadListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void fileUploadListener(org.primefaces.event.FileUploadEvent)
Method expression to listen file upload events.
multiple false java.lang.Boolean false
Allows for multiple file uploads, default is set to false.
auto false java.lang.Boolean false
When set to true selecting a file starts the upload implicitly.
label false java.lang.String
Label of the browse button, default is 'Browse'.
image false java.lang.String
Image for the browse button.
cancelImage false java.lang.String
Image for the cancel icon.
width false java.lang.String
Width of the browse button.
height false java.lang.String
Height of the browse button.
allowTypes false java.lang.String
File extensions that can be accepted, use a comma seperated list for more than one.
description false java.lang.String
Label to desribe what types of files can be selected.
sizeLimit false java.lang.Long java.lang.Long.MAX_VALUE
Number of maximum bytes that is allowed for a file size.
wmode false java.lang.String
wmode property of the flash object.
customUI false java.lang.Boolean false When customUI is turned on, upload and cancel controls won't be rendered and page authors can create their own ui using client side api.
style false java.lang.String Style of the main container of fileUpload.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container of fileUpload.
